entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of snow or rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
